product_name: DoreLe Disque Cleansing and Exfoliating Tool for All Skin Types
summary: SummaryDoré's Le Disque Cleansing Tool is a contemporary cleansing tool designed to cleanse and massage the skin while gently removing stubborn dirt, dead skin, oil and makeup. Meant to be used once or twice a week as a gentle physical exfoliator. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPairs with Doré Le CleanserProvides a thorough cleanse and gently exfoliates the skin in one simple stepThe edges of Le Disque can be used to effectively cleanse targeted areas around the noseThe larger flat surface allows for easy cleansing on the forehead, cheeks and chinTextured bristles provide a light massage that helps lift and firm the skinImproves circulation and lymphatic drainageIncreases absorption of skincare productsHelps soften, smooth and brighten the skinProvides a gentle physical alternative to chemical exfoliantsAnti-microbial silicone inhibits the growth of bacteria and is easy to sterilizeAnti-microbial silicone is highly durable and resistant to external influences such as oxygen, ozone, UV light, aging, weather, and extreme temperaturesDesigned to be used to cleanse and ready your skin for any treatments and moisturizers as its own stand alone step in your beauty routinePlastic Neutral through Doré’s partnership with rePurpose GlobalFeaturesMade of an anti-microbial silicone exfoliating surface and a soft touch matte BPA-free plastic hand gripIncludes an anti-microbial silicone protective coverThe dimensions of Le Disque are 2.3in/60mm W x 1.6in/40mm H x 2.3in/60mm D. The tool weighs 0.4lbs/182gLe Disque’s outer packaging can be placed in recycling or compost binItem 2631866How To UseRinse the face and the tool with lukewarm water. Apply Le Cleanser or your regular cleanser to Le Disque. Using gentle, circular motions, move Le Disque around the face to gently cleanse the skin and remove dirt and impurities as needed. Rinse the face to remove any excess cleanser, then pat dry. Rinse Le Disque with warm water and allow to dry fully before replacing the cover. Follow with any treatments and moisturizer.Avoid using the cleansing tool on open wounds, active breakouts or extremely sensitive skin.Do not use excessive pressure during application to prevent any discomfort.Rinse before first use.Doré always recommends testing the the tool on a patch of skin such as your wrist before using it on your face.Pro tip:In addition to your face, use to gently cleanse, exfoliate and massage your neck and décolletage.Three simple steps, one skincare routine. Suitable for both AM and PM:Step 1: Cleanse with La Micellaire Botanical Cleansing Water and/or Le Cleanser Gel to Milk CleanserStep 2: Hydrate, soften and brighten the skin with La Crème All-in-One Daily MoisturizerStep 3: Add extra moisture and repair dry skin with Le Baume All-in-One Balm
how_to_use: Rinse the face and the tool with lukewarm water. Apply Le Cleanser or your regular cleanser to Le Disque. Using gentle, circular motions, move Le Disque around the face to gently cleanse the skin and remove dirt and impurities as needed. Rinse the face to remove any excess cleanser, then pat dry. Rinse Le Disque with warm water and allow to dry fully before replacing the cover. Follow with any treatments and moisturizer.Avoid using the cleansing tool on open wounds, active breakouts or extremely sensitive skin.Do not use excessive pressure during application to prevent any discomfort.Rinse before first use.Doré always recommends testing the the tool on a patch of skin such as your wrist before using it on your face.Pro tip:In addition to your face, use to gently cleanse, exfoliate and massage your neck and décolletage.Three simple steps, one skincare routine. Suitable for both AM and PM:Step 1: Cleanse with La Micellaire Botanical Cleansing Water and/or Le Cleanser Gel to Milk CleanserStep 2: Hydrate, soften and brighten the skin with La Crème All-in-One Daily MoisturizerStep 3: Add extra moisture and repair dry skin with Le Baume All-in-One Balm

reviews.headline: Causing Me To Break Out?
reviews.comments: I think this thing is causing tears in my skin causing me to break out even more than before. Like it is really rough on my skin. Not smooth scrubbing like the Foreo Luna that i have had for years before it got all moldy. I dont know for sure. Going to keep using for now until i find a replacement then will see.

reviews.headline: Please make a body version
reviews.comments: Forgot to say in my last review, please please please continue to make tools and make a body version of this.

reviews.headline: So much better than other silicone scrubbers
reviews.comments: As someone that has used different silicone scrubber brands for the last decade, this has changed my life. My skin has never looked better and my dryness is no longer an issue.

reviews.headline: So much better than other silicone scrubbers
reviews.comments: As someone that has used different silicone scrubber brands for the last decade, this has changed my life. My skin has never looked better and my dryness is no longer an issue.

reviews.headline: Something you didn't know you needed
reviews.comments: Came across this product during the recent sales and purchased it with a haul. This is one of my favorite purchases. I get dry skin in the winter and try to remedy it the best I can. This scrubber seems to help a lot and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. No irritiation either. Try it for yourself!

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: Works well and gets the job done. It leaves my skin feeling smooth, clean, and refreshed after use without being over abrasive. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to cleanse their face with just a little more "oomf" than their hands washing. It's affordable, durable, portable, you do not need to worry about working parts, replaceable/refillables. It's just a nice simple, and practical tool for your skincare routine.

media.headline: A calming, gentle scrubbing tool for your face
So much better than the electric exfoliators!

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using the Le Disque by Dore in the shower along with my Le Cleanser face wash by Dore. The combination of the two is perfect! Le Disque gives a nice gentle exfoliation that feels like my face is really getting the cleaning it deserves. It also feels like i'm getting some lymphatic stimulation which is an added bonus. The little rubber prongs? ..not sure what to call them are soft and glide over the skin beautifully. It doesn't feel harsh at all like most exfoliating products. Loving this new product by Dore.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great New Product from Dore

faceoff_negative.comments: I think this thing is causing tears in my skin causing me to break out even more than before. Like it is really rough on my skin. Not smooth scrubbing like the Foreo Luna that i have had for years before it got all moldy. I dont know for sure. Going to keep using for now until i find a replacement then will see.
